__e: I was in Grand Central Station, just kinda... trying to piece together what I want to play.
Grand Central... thinking of every reason in the world to not go see the girl that broke your heart.
He messaged me once out of the blue... mutual friend... and asked me to take a photo with him by Grand Central of all places.
She and her company, who are in this hotel at this very moment, even as you lie here on your bed in the Grand Hotel on June 27th, 1912... 6:00 p.m., June 27th, 1912.
You say to go walking, but where is the Grand Hotel?
With a serious face, the carabiniere says "The sergeant told me to look for a hotel room for him"
